replies.body:
~~actually we are secretly letting them die on purpose so we can take their cs~~ 
Yup. This is 100% accurate.

~~all part of the plan~~
can confirm

Can't deny that's sometimes tempting.
When it's late game and I just need 200 gold or so for an item and I need to back for wards it can get really annoying when nobody would let me take those 8 minions I need.

{{champion:51}} So what's new on M&G?
{{champion:432}} An accurate depiction of support/adc relationships
{{champion:51}} ... I said new.
{{champion:51}} ... also...
{{champion:51}} >:(
But which one is Bard? Whenever I support my ADC is the one sleeping, but whenever I ADC, my support would be the one in the car, # feelsbadman

... Yes .__.

(the sleeping one, I wanted the part where the he enters a room with two aliens getting ready to dissect the other one, grabs a bunch of syringes and leaves him there, but I couldn't find a gif of just that part ): )

~~only supports ward~~

This cannot be more accurate.
